name: zero_lt_4dfp
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: A tool to process 4dfp image files by zeroing values less than a given float threshold.

inputs.description: Floating point threshold value. Values less than this in the 4dfp file will be zeroed.
inputs.name: Float threshold

inputs.description: Output root name for 4dfp file. If not specified, defaults to input file root with 'z' appended.
inputs.name: Output root

inputs.description: Specify output endian format: 'b' for big endian or 'l' for little endian. Defaults to input endian.
inputs.name: Endianness

output-files.description: Output 4dfp file with values less than the threshold zeroed.
output-files.name: Output 4dfp file
